Package fr.formiko.kokcinelo.tools

Class Musics

java.lang.Object
fr.formiko.kokcinelo.tools.Musics
public class Musics extends Object
Tools class to manage music. It aways play only one music at a time. It have a null safety for every function.
Since:
0.2
Version:
1.3
